thread.section_title: Mobile-Mate Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mobile-Mate | mobile-mate.com.au
thread.title: Pekka Olkinuora

author: Pekka Olkinuora
title: Pekka Olkinuora
text:
Fastest - company- courier-Australian Post ever in my life!
I did order item late afternoon and I got it next day 2.10 pm
delivered to my front door by our regular mail Lady.
Nowhere in the world could not be better service like that.
I would use the company if I ever needed something from their
store. And I will recommend the company to my friends, as I have
already done so.
The best customer service ever!
Regards: Pekka Olkinuora
Mob. 0451271301
Email petteri65gmail.com
